package.name: iSupervisor
package.shortDescription: This tweak enables supervised mode without the need of wiping the device (via Apple Configurator) or using Apple Device Enrolment Program(DEP).

descriptionlist.description: System-wide AdBlock HERE OR in LINKS section bellow

With supervised mode, you can enable many hidden features:
  • Enable True Always On VPN
  • Global HTTP Proxy
  • Single App Mode

  • Apply restrictions to the device (parental controls, block gamecenter, imessages, airdrop, etc)
  • Prevent Apple Music
  • And many more
